word:
"Come unto me, all ye that labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; . . . and ye shall find 


                                    -261- 

rest unto your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light" (Matt 11:28-30). This is the higher education, to learn the meekness and lowliness of Christ.--Ms 185, 1898, p. 6. (Diary, August 11, 1898).
